channel.title: Revoscape 508 development team
channel.description:
hey guys im revo im looking for a awesome development team.
Owner - revo also head coder In game admin - Open, open In game mod- abbi, open Advertiser- open Web admin-frozen Web designer- frozen Server coders - revo, kane, open Hoster- thebest091
Im planning to implement G.e bosses/ minigames construction skill 100% Fix some glitches code new training areas and pk zones
Application form:
Preferable Position: E-Mail: Timezone: Years of experience with private servers of any game (and what game, too): How many hours a day (on average) can you dedicate to this private server? Weekdays- 3-6 (except every second thursday - Sunday) Weekends: Are you able to code in Java? Are you able to code in HTML? Are you able to code in JavaScript? Other programming languages you know: Are you a creative person? Anything else that could be useful:

item.title: Revoscape 508 development team
item.dc:creator: @Xdivinex Xdivinex
item.description:
@Xdivinex wrote:

Preferable Position: Coder
E-Mail: rune.locus@hotmail.com
Timezone: Eastern
Years of experience with private servers of any game (2, Ritzscape Admin and Coder):
How many hours a day (on average) can you dedicate to this private server? Weekdays- 3-6 (except every second thursday - Sunday) Weekends: 4-6
Are you able to code in Java? yes
Are you able to code in HTML? somewhat
Are you able to code in JavaScript? average
Other programming languages you know: C++
Are you a creative person? yes
Anything else that could be useful: I have made multiple 508’s and would love to be a part of your staff

Read full topic

item.title: Revoscape 508 development team
item.dc:creator: @SunSpec221 SunSpec221
item.description:
@SunSpec221 wrote:

[quote=“Kaex, post:1, topic:375247”][font=comic sans ms]Preferable Position: Server / Client programmer
E-Mail: yournotgettingit@lolol.com
Timezone: 0034 AD. // I’m actually sat with Christ right now, hes a Javascript expert!
Years of experience with private servers of any game (and what game, too): 3-4 years Java
How many hours a day (on average) can you dedicate to this private server? //
Weekdays: As much
Weekends: as I want.
Are you able to code in Java? Yes.
Are you able to code in HTML? Yes, not the best in HTML
Are you able to code in JavaScript? Yes
Other programming languages you know: C,C++ and a lil Python
Are you a creative person? No.
Anything else that could be useful: No.
Do you actually want to join this project? Yes this is awesome :D[/font][/quote]

Your really intrested
